ValidationRule.description: You can't complete the 'Complete RFC' field until the Status = Approved
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL( Status__c,'Approved' )), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Status__c,'Complete' )), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Status__c,'Unsuccessful' )), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Complete_RFC__c , '' )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can not complete an RFC until the Status = Approved
